summary: This is an email from June 2, 2008, forwarding a document titled 'Conf Plea Negotiations final.wpd' that was reportedly presented at a meeting on July 31st (likely 2007 or earlier). The email suggests ongoing confidential plea negotiations in the Epstein case.

events.title: Email forwarding plea negotiation document
events.description: An email is sent forwarding a confidential plea negotiations document titled 'Conf Plea Negotiations final.wpd'.

events.title: Meeting where plea negotiation document was presented
events.description: A meeting occurred where the confidential plea negotiations document was reportedly presented.

keyFacts: A confidential plea negotiation document titled 'Conf Plea Negotiations final.wpd' was circulated via email on June 2, 2008.
The document was reportedly presented at a meeting on July 31st (likely 2007, given the email date).
The email indicates ongoing plea negotiations in the Epstein case as of mid-2008.
The document filename suggests the negotiations were confidential and possibly in final stages.
